p.note: Light brown papyrus written in a thin pen with black ink perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The original cutting lines have been preserved at the top, left and right sides. The end of the papyrus is broken off, and there are two large holes and several smaller holes in the papyrus. On the left side one fiber had broken off in antiquity, the writing continuing on the back of the horizontal fibers of Verso.
